settings.title: Extend your fasting window with Fast Bar
settings.subheading: Skip hunger & boost energy so you can fast for longer with Fast Bar.

settings.title: Fast Bar is the first and only bar that nourishes your body to support fasting goals for weight management and a healthy lifestyle.
Fast Bar is the first and only bar that nourishes your body to support fasting goals for weight management and a healthy lifestyle.
settings.text:
Fast Bar was clinically tested as part of the ProLon®, Fasting Mimicking Diet®, is loaded with flavor and packed with healthy nutrients to satisfy food cravings, or extend your intermittent fast until your next meal.

The formulation of Fast Bar® comes from science. After 20 years of research, scientists at the University of Southern California (USC) discovered a nutri-technology that nourishes the body while keeping it in a fasting mode known as the Fasting Mimicking Diet® (FMD®).

settings.title: How to enjoy a Fast Bar and experience the health benefits that come with it:
settings.text:
Fast Bar’s recipe is designed to nourish your body while maintaining its fasting state. For that reason, it’s best enjoyed during either your morning intermittent fasting window or as a late-night snack to satiate you before bed.

Similar to water, our delicious flavors do not raise your blood glucose levels and keep your ketones in a fasting state*!

  • • Fast Bar® is ideal for those who skip breakfast, practice intermittent fasting, or follow a paleo, keto or fasting diet.

  • • Enjoy one as a snack anytime during the day to fuel your body when on the go.

settings.heading: Fast Bar is the first and only bar that nourishes your body to support fasting goals for weight management and a healthy lifestyle.

settings.title: Enhance your fasting with the unique and premium formulation of Fast Bar®

settings.html: Fast Bar is the first and only bar that nourishes your body to support fasting goals for weight management and a healthy lifestyle. Fast Bar is a non-GMO, gluten-free, and soy-free.

settings.title: Experience the benefits of Fasting & Nutrition with Fast Bar.
settings.description:
Fast Bar was clinically tested* as part of the ProLon®, Fasting Mimicking Diet®, is loaded with flavor and packed with healthy nutrients to satisfy food cravings, or extend your intermittent fast until your next meal.

The formulation of Fast Bar® comes from science. After 20 years of research, scientists at the University of Southern California (USC) discovered a nutri-technology that nourishes the body while keeping it in a fasting mode known as the Fasting Mimicking Diet® (FMD®).

*Fast Bar has not been clinically tested on its own.

settings.title: How to enjoy a Fast Bar® and experience the health benefits that come with it:
settings.description:
• Fast Bar® is ideal for those who skip breakfast, practice intermittent fasting, or follow a paleo, keto or fasting diet.
• Enjoy one as a snack anytime during the day to fuel your body when on the go.
• Fast bar can be purchased in boxes of 10, 20, or 30, or subscribe & save for the best deal.
